thread.section_title: Bolt Depot Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bolt Depot | www.boltdepot.com
thread.title: Michael Ankuda
thread.title_full: Bolt Depot reviewed by Michael Ankuda

author: Michael Ankuda
title: Michael Ankuda
text:
The website for online ordering is clear and easy to edit. With the help of my print catalog, I was able to assemble my order for over (2) dozen various sizes of bolts and washers in record time.
The ability to edit the order, and then to drop it into one's shopping cart is user friendly.
The order was delivered promptly and accurately. Thank you again.
